body_html: @hhusum @aselle Yes, this error occurs because tfdbg uses curses to manage the terminal UI by default. PyCharm is an environment that does not have a tty for curses to use. To work around this, set the ui_type kwarg to readline when using LocalCLIDebugWrapperSession or LocalCLIDebugHook.
body_text: @hhusum @aselle Yes, this error occurs because tfdbg uses curses to manage the terminal UI by default. PyCharm is an environment that does not have a tty for curses to use. To work around this, set the ui_type kwarg to readline when using LocalCLIDebugWrapperSession or LocalCLIDebugHook.
body: @hhusum @aselle Yes, this error occurs because tfdbg uses `curses` to manage the terminal UI by default. PyCharm is an environment that does not have a tty for curses to use. To work around this, set the `ui_type` kwarg to `readline` when using `LocalCLIDebugWrapperSession` or `LocalCLIDebugHook`.
